summary: Four teenagers spend their first summer after graduation at a fishing collective in Estonia.
cast: Lyudmila Marchenko|Aleksandr Zbruev|Oleg Dal|Andrey Mironov|Oleg Efremov|Ivan Savkin|Arvo Kruusement|Jaan Saul|Sergei Kurilov|Villu Tomingas|Oleg Golubitsky|Leili Jäärats|Evgeniy Kharitonov|Valentin Kulik|Klavdiya Lepanova|Mikhail Nazvanov|Vladimir Pitsek|Raus Sander|Mall Sillandi|Peeter Tedre|Yan Yanakiyev|O. Bludnitsky
title: Moy mladshiy brat
